    chapter 10. ê°ì²´ë“¤ ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ê´€ê³„ : ì§‘í•© ê´€ê³„

    ê´€ê³„ ì¢…ë¥˜ ê´€ê³„ë¥¼ í‘œí˜„í•˜ëŠ” ë™ì‚¬ ê´€ê³„ í˜•íƒœ ë‹¤ë¥¸ í´ë˜ìŠ¤ì— ì†í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ”ê°€? ë©¤ë²„ì˜ ì¡´ì¬ë¥¼

      • ë©¤ë²„

        • Teacher teacher : ê°•ì˜ ë‹´ë‹¹ êµì‚¬ ê°ì²´

    ğŸ“œStudent.h

    #pragma once

#include <iostream>
#include <string>

class Student
{
private:
	std::string m_name;
	int m_intel; 

public:
	Student(const std::string & name_in = "No Name", const int & intel_in = 0)
		: m_name(name_in), m_intel(intel_in)
	{}

	void setName(const std::string & name_in)
	{
		m_name = name_in;

	}

	void setIntel(const int & intel_in)
	{
		m_intel = intel_in;
	}

	int getIntel()
	{
		return m_intel;
	}

	friend std::ostream & operaotr << (std::ostream & out, const Student & student)
	{
		out << student.m_name << " " << student.m_intel;
		return out;
	}
};
    • ë©¤ë²„
      • string m_name : í•™ìƒ ì´ë¦„
      • int m_intel : í•™ìƒ ì§€ëŠ¥


    ğŸ“œTeacher.h

    #pragma once

#include <string>

class Teacher
{
private:
	std::string m_name;

public:
    Teacher()
    {}

	Teacher(const std::string & name_in)
		: m_name(name_in)
	{}

	void setName(const std::string & name_in)
	{
		m_name = name_in;
	}

	std::string getName()
	{
		return m_name;
	}

	friend std::ostream & operaotr << (std::ostream & out, const Teacher & teacher)
	{
		out << teacher.m_name;
		return out;
	}
};
    • ë©¤ë²„
      • string m_name : êµì‚¬ ì´ë¦„


    ğŸ“œLecture.h

    #pragma once

#include <vector>
#include "Student.h"
#include "Teacher.h"

class Lecture
{
private:
	std::string m_name;

	Teacher teacher;
	std::vector<Student> students; 

public:
	Lecture(const std::string & name_in)
		: m_name(name_in)
	{}

	void assignTeacher(const Teacher & const teacher_input)
	{
		teacher = teacher_input;
	}

	void registerStudent(const Student & const student_input)
	{
		students.push_back(student_input);
	}

	void study()
	{
		std::cout << m_name << " Study " << std::endl;

		for (auto & element : students)
			element.setIntel(element.getIntel() + 1);
	}

	friend std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & out, const Lecture & lecture)
	{
		out << "Lecture name: " << lecture.m_name << std::endl;

		out << lecture.teacher << std::endl;
		for (auto element : lecture.students)
			out << element << std::endl;

     return out;
	}
};

    class Lecture
{
private:
	std::string m_name;

	Teacher teacher;
	std::vector<Student> students;

    Lectureê°ì²´ê°€ ì‚¬ë¼ì§€ë©´ ê·¸ì— ì†í•œ Teacher ê°ì²´ ë©¤ë²„ì™€ Student ë²¡í„° ê°ì²´ ë©¤ë²„ë„ í•¨ê»˜ ì‚¬ë¼ì§„ë‹¤. êµ¬ì„± ê´€ê³„ ì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸

    • ë©¤ë²„ ë³€ìˆ˜
      • string m_name : ê°•ì˜ ì´ë¦„
      • Teacher teacher : ê°•ì˜ ë‹´ë‹¹ êµì‚¬ ê°ì²´
        • #include â€œTeacher.hâ€
      • std::vector<Student> students : ìˆ˜ê°•í•˜ëŠ” í•™ìƒë“¤ ê°ì²´ ë²¡í„°
        • #include â€œStudent.hâ€
    • ë©¤ë²„ í•¨ìˆ˜
      • void assignTeacher(const Teacher & const teacher_input)
        • í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ì— êµì‚¬ë¥¼ ë°°ì •í•¨
          • ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë°›ì€ êµì‚¬ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ì˜ êµì‚¬ ë©¤ë²„ì— ëŒ€ì…í•¨
      • void registerStudent(const Student & const student_input)
      • í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ì— í•™ìƒì„ ë°°ì •í•¨
        • ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë°›ì€ í•™ìƒ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ì˜ í•™ìƒ ë²¡í„° ë©¤ë²„ì— ì‚½ì… ì¶”ê°€í•œë‹¤.

        • ìê¸° ìì‹ (ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´)ì„ ìˆ˜ê°•í•˜ë©´ í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ë¥¼ ë“¤ì€ í•™ìƒë“¤ì˜ m_intel ì„ 1 ì˜¬ë¦°ë‹¤. ì¦‰, ì§€ëŠ¥ ì¦ê°€!

    ì˜ˆì‹œ 1

    ğŸ“œmain.cpp

    #include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include "Lecture.h"

int main()
{
	using namespace std;

	//composition relationship
	Lecture lec1("C++");
	lec1.assignTeacher(Teacher("Prof. Hong"));
	lec1.registerStudent(Student("Jack Jack", 0));
	lec1.registerStudent(Student("Dash, 1"));
	lec1.registerStudent(Student("Violet", 2));

	Lecture lec2("Java");
	lec2.assignTeacher(Teacher("Prof. Good"));
	lec2.registerStudent(Student("Jack Jack", 0));

	{
		cout << lec1 << endl;
		cout << lec2 << endl;

		lec2.study();

		cout << lec1 << endl;
		cout << lec2 << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}

    â€œJack Jackâ€ í•™ìƒì€ Java ìˆ˜ì—…ê³¼ C++ ìˆ˜ì—…ì„ ë™ì‹œì— ìˆ˜ê°•í•˜ê³  ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— lec2.study(); Java ìˆ˜ì—…ì„ ê³µë¶€í•œ í›„ì—ëŠ” â€œJack Jackâ€ í•™ìƒ ê°ì²´ì˜ m_intelì´ 1 ì¦ê°€í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë‚˜ ì¶œë ¥ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ lect1ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ í•™ìƒì€ m_intelê°’ì´ ì—¬ì „íˆ 0 ì´ê³  lect2ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ í•™ìƒë§Œ m_intelê°’ì´ 1 ì¦ê°€í•œ ê²ƒì„ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ì¦‰ lect1ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê°ì²´ì™€ Java++ ìˆ˜ì—… ê°ì²´ lect2ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê°ì²´ëŠ” ì„œë¡œ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì¡´ì¬ì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— Java ìˆ˜ì—…ì„ ìˆ˜ê°•í–ˆë”ë¼ë„ lect2ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê°ì²´ì—ë§Œ ì§€ëŠ¥ì´ ì¦ê°€í–ˆë‹¤.

    ë¬¸ì œì 

    • C++ ìˆ˜ì—… ê°ì²´ lect1ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê°ì²´ì™€ Java++ ìˆ˜ì—… ê°ì²´ lect2ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê°ì²´ëŠ” ì„œë¡œ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì¡´ì¬ì´ë‹¤.
      • ë©¤ë²„ ê°’ì´ ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ ê°™ì„ ë¿, ì¦‰ ê·¸ëƒ¥ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ë§Œ ê°™ì„ ë¿ì´ë‹¤.
      • C++ ìˆ˜ì—…ì„ ë“£ëŠ” â€œJack Jackâ€ê³¼ Java ìˆ˜ì—…ì„ ë“£ëŠ” â€œJack Jackâ€ëŠ” ë™ì¼ ì¸ë¬¼ ì·¨ê¸‰ì„ ë°›ì•„ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ì¦‰, ì£¼ì†Œê°€ ê°™ì€ ë™ì¼í•œ ê°ì²´ì—¬ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.

    í•™ìƒ ê°ì²´ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì„ Lec1, Lec2 ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— êµ¬ì„± ìš”ì†Œë¡œ ì†í•´ì„  ì•ˆëœë‹¤. í•™ìƒ ê°ì²´ë“¤ì€ ê°ê° ì—¬ëŸ¬ ê°•ì˜ì— ì†í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ì•¼ í•˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê°•ì˜ì™€ í•™ìƒì€ ì§‘í•© ê´€ê³„ë¡œ ì´ë£¨ì–´ì ¸ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. í•™ìƒì´ êµì§‘í•©ìœ¼ë¡œì„œ ì´ ê°•ì˜ ì € ê°•ì˜ì—ë„ ì†í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡!


    ì˜ˆì‹œ 2

    í•™ìƒ ê°ì²´ë“¤ê³¼ ì„ ìƒë‹˜ ê°ì²´ë“¤ì„ ë…ë¦½ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¯¸ë¦¬ ìƒì„±í•´ë‘” í›„ ì´ë¥¼ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë„˜ê¸´ë‹¤ë©´ ì–´ë–¨ê¹Œ?

    ğŸ“œmain.cpp

    #include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include "Lecture.h"

int main()
{
	using namespace std;

    Student std1("Jack Jack", 0);
	Student std2("Dash", 1);
	Student std3("Violet", 2);

	Teacher teacher1("Prof. Hong");
	Teacher teacher2("Prof. Good");

	//composition relationship
	Lecture lec1("C++");
	lec1.assignTeacher(teacher1);
	lec1.registerStudent(std1);
	lec1.registerStudent(std2);
	lec1.registerStudent(std3);

	Lecture lec2("Java");
	lec2.assignTeacher(teacher2);
	lec2.registerStudent(std1);

	{
		cout << lec1 << endl;
		cout << lec2 << endl;

		lec2.study();

		cout << lec1 << endl;
		cout << lec2 << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
    • ì¶œë ¥ ê²°ê³¼ë¥¼ ë³´ë©´ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ ìˆì§€ë§Œ ê°ì²´ë“¤ì„ ë…ë¦½ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¯¸ë¦¬ ìƒì„±í•´ë‘” í›„ ì´ë¥¼ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë„˜ê²¨ì£¼ë”ë¼ë„ ì—¬ì „íˆ ë¬¸ì œëŠ” í•´ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë‹¤.
      • ì—¬ì „íˆ C++ì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ê³¼ Javaì˜ â€œJack Jackâ€ì€ ë³„ê°œì˜ ê°ì²´ì´ë‹¤.


    ë¬¸ì œì 

    ê°ì²´ë“¤ì„ ë…ë¦½ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¯¸ë¦¬ ìƒì„±í•´ë‘” í›„ ì´ë¥¼ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë„˜ê²¨ì£¼ë”ë¼ë„ ì¸ìˆ˜ê°€ ë²¡í„° ë©¤ë²„ì— Call-by-Value ë¡œ ë³µì‚¬ ë˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì´ë‹¤.

    void registerStudent(const Student & const student_input)
{
	students.push_back(student_input);
}

...
lec1.registerStudent(std1);
lec2.registerStudent(std1);

    • std1ì´ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë„˜ì–´ê°€ë©´ì„œ ë§¤ê°œ ë³€ìˆ˜ student_input ì´ std1 ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ê²Œ ëœë‹¤.
      • const Student & const íƒ€ì…ì´ë¯€ë¡œ.
    • ë²¡í„°ì— student_input, ì¦‰ std1 ê°ì²´ê°€ ì‚½ì…ë˜ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ì—ì„œ ë‚´ë¶€ì ìœ¼ë¡œ lect1.students[0] = student_input ë˜ë©° Call by Value ë³µì‚¬ê°€ ì´ë£¨ì–´ì§„ë‹¤.
      • ì¦‰ lect1.students[0]ê³¼ std1 ê°ì²´ëŠ” ì„œë¡œ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì¡´ì¬ì´ë‹¤. ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ë§Œ ê°™ì„ë¿
      • ê³ ë¡œ lect1.students[0]ê³¼ lect2.students[0]ë„ ì„œë¡œ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì¡´ì¬ì´ë‹¤. ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ë§Œ ê°™ì„ë¿

    ë”°ë¼ì„œ ë™ì¼í•œ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì¸ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë„˜ê²¨ì£¼ì–´ë„ Call by Valueë¡œ ë³µì‚¬ê°€ ì´ë£¨ì–´ì§€ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— â€œJack Jackâ€ì´ ë™ê¸°í™” ë˜ì§€ ì•ŠëŠ” ë¬¸ì œê°€ ì—¬ì „íˆ í•´ê²°ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë‹¤.

    í•™ìƒ ê°œê°œì¸ì˜ ê°ì²´ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì€ êµ¬ì„±ê´€ê³„ë¡œì„œ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— ì†Œì†ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì•„ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ê·¸ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì„ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ëŠ” í¬ì¸í„°ë§Œ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— ì†Œì†ë˜ê³  ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì€ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— ë…ë¦½ì ì´ì–´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ê°ê° ë‹¤ë¥¸ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì—ë„ ì†í•˜ëŠ”ê²Œ ê°€ëŠ¥í•˜ë„ë¡!


    ğŸ”” ì§‘í•© ê´€ê³„ : í¬ì¸í„° ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê¸°

    ì§‘í•© ê´€ê³„ë¥¼ ë‚˜íƒ€ë‚´ëŠ” ì½”ë“œ

    ğŸ“œLecture.h

    #include <vector>
#include "Student.h"
#include "Teacher.h"

class Lecture
{
private:
	std::string m_name;

	Teacher *teacher;
	std::vector<Student*> students;

public:
	Lecture(const std::string & name_in)
		: m_name(name_in)
	{}

	~Lecture()
	{
		delete teacher;
		cout << "delete teacher" << endl;
		
		for (auto & element : students)
		{
		    delete element;
		}
		cout << "delete students" << endl;
	}

	void assignTeacher(Teacher * const teacher_input)
	{
		teacher = teacher_input;
	}

	void registerStudent(Student * const student_input)
	{
		students.push_back(student_input);
	}

	void study()
	{
		std::cout << m_name << "Study " << std::endl << std::endl;

		for (auto element : students)
			(*element).setIntel((*element).getIntel() + 1);
	}

	friend std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream & out, const Lecture & lecture)
	{
		out << "Lecture name: " << lecture.m_name << std::endl;

		out << lecture.teacher << std::endl;
		for (auto element : lecture.students)
			out << *element << std::endl;

     return out;
	}
};

    ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì€ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— êµ¬ì„±(ì†Œì†)ë˜ì§€ ì•Šê²Œ í•˜ê³  ê·¸ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì˜ ì£¼ì†Œë¥¼ ë‹´ì€ í¬ì¸í„°ë§Œ ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ì— êµ¬ì„±(ì†Œì†)ë˜ê²Œ í•œë‹¤.

    • ë©¤ë²„ë¥¼ ê°ì²´ í¬ì¸í„°ë¡œ ë°”ê¾¸ì—ˆë‹¤.
      • Teacher *teacher;
      • std::vector<Student> students;*
    • ì†Œë©¸ì
      • ê°ì²´ í¬ì¸í„°ì—ë‹¤ í•™ìƒ, êµì‚¬ ê°ì²´ì˜ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì€ ë™ì í• ë‹¹ ë°›ì„ ê²ƒì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê°•ì˜ ê°ì²´ê°€ ì†Œë©¸ë  ë•Œ í•™ìƒ, êµì‚¬ ê°ì²´ì˜ ë‚´ìš©ë¬¼ì´ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ í•´ì œë  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ deleteë¥¼ í•´ì£¼ì—ˆë‹¤.

    #include <iostream>

int main()
{
	using namespace std;

	// ê°™ì€ í•™ìƒì´ë‚˜ êµìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì¬ìƒì„±í•˜ì§€ ì•Šë„ë¡ 
	Student *std1 = new Student("Jack Jack", 0);
	Student *std2 = new Student("Dash", 1);
	Student *std3 = new Student("Violet", 2);

		cout << lec2 << endl;

		//event

		cout << lec2 << endl;
	}
